

设置MAC和SN：49 48 3E 00 00 00 00 30 FF FF 61 1F A8 C0 53 45 54 4D 41 43 3D 31 32 33 34 35 36 31 32 33 34 35 36 23 53 45 54 53 4E 3D 4A 59 57 4C 53 5A 48 4D 53 31 31 38 30 34 30 37 30 30 30 30 31 23

获取MAC和SN：49 48 0E 00 00 00 00 31 FF FF 61 1F A8 C0

测试数码管：49 48 15 00 00 00 00 31 FF FF 61 1F A8 C0 12 34 56 12 34 56 01


SETMAC=001122334455#SETSN=JY**********18040700001#




登陆命令：4A 59 17 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 61 1F A8 C0 34 34 34 35 35 35 36 36 36

设置IP：  4A 59 18 00 00 00 00 02 FF FF 8B 1F A8 C0 12 34 56 12 34 56 8B 1F A8 C0
